snippet.title: Project Apparatus - Announcement trailer
snippet.description: Project Apparatus is a 2.5D puzzle platformer game coming soon to Steam. Control a small robot in a large factory full of dangerous obstacles and deadly enemies while you attempt to restore power and control. Check it out.
